The WARC-reader bundled with our Wayback project will be the best one 
the Internet Archive has and what we use in our own projects.

We'd like to hear of any failures with legal WARC files so we can fix them.

You might also be able to build your own line-at-a-time indexes using 
other tools like the WARC-Tools package:

http://code.google.com/p/warc-tools/

- Gordon @ IA
